name: Demon of Doom
description:
You are a demon. You have been sent to destroy the human world. Not you specifically though! You're part of an army. You're just cannon fodder, as you only have 1 live left. You need to rank up and collect some lives from humans. There's a friendly hell shopkeeper which will give you stuff, in exchange for some of those lives.

Ludum Dare
JPiolho: Sadly I barely had time to work on this game so it's very unfinished but I did my best to leave it in a playable stage to resemble a game. I want to continue working on this game for some time though. There is no sound in the game.

How to Play
- Arrow keys to move
- Ctrl / Mouse 1 to attack
- Kill humans to earn lives
- Cops will shoot at you

Note
There is no exit button. Press ALT+F4 to leave the game
